snippet.title: If On A Winter's Night, Four Travelers - Steam release date trailer
snippet.description:
If On A Winter's Night, Four Travelers is a narrative-driven point-and-click adventure exploring the stories of four different guests in a masked ball taking place on a train in the late 1920s.

Out September 21 for free on:

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1603980/

itch.io: https://laurahunt.itch.io/if-on-a-winters-night-four-travelers

Visit https://twitter.com/deadidlegames for updates and https://www.notion.so/If-On-A-Winter-s-Night-Four-Travelers-Presskit-ada8a08ac457480da5b211bfe12721fe for the press kit!
